EmailTemplate.name: RE: Important Info Re. Projects with Insight (1358446052.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Important Info Re. Projects with Insight (1358446052.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Meg, It’s so nice to meet you via email, and thanks Nicole for the introduction. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. I will also call you toinght to see if we can schdule something as well. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Nicole Brotherton Sent: Thursday, January 17, 2013 1:05 PM To: Meg Plummer Cc: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Important Info Re. Projects with Insight Hi Meg, Thanks for the update. As I am specific to the Insight account, I am connecting you with Sara Conde, our Consultant Services Advisor. She will answer all your questions about getting set up with Ed and CNA, and is the most appropriate person to help you. Sara will reach out directly momentarily with her contact details. Of course, I am available anytime if you need to speak with me as well; I hope your foot gets better! Best Regards,Nicole From: Meg Plummer [mailto:megplummer1@gmail.com <mailto:megplummer1@gmail.com>] Sent: Thursday, January 17, 2013 11:09 AM To: Nicole Brotherton Subject: Re: Important Info Re. Projects with Insight Hi Nicole,It is great to hear from you. I will work on the survey later and setup a time with you, but I need to clarify something. This is not an assignment through Insight Enterprises and they know nothing about this. I do not work for them directly, but I have worked for them as a contractor for the past 2 years. I am on a break from Insight (going to school and recovering from recent foot surgery). I provided the Insight information as background but my intention was to work directly through MBO and not have Insight involved in this engagement because Insight charges more than Ed / CNA would pay for my services. I have a long school day today but will get back to setting up a time to chat later. Thank You! Kind Regards, Meg PlummerOn Thu, Jan 17, 2013 at 8:10 AM, Nicole Brotherton <nbrotherton@mbopartners.com <mailto:nbrotherton@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Meg, My name is Nicole Brotherton, and Ed forwarded me your name and email address so I can help get you on boarded for any future assignments with Insight. My company, MBO Partners, helps Insight manage its engagement of contract-based workers and small businesses. As you work on your assignment with Insight, you’ll be working “through” MBO. We’ll handle your invoicing, payments, and more so you can stay focused on your work. I’m sure you’re eager to get started on your assignment, but there are some steps to take care of first. Schedule a time to speak with me. I’ll conduct a personal consultation with you to learn about your business and work with Insight. Based on this understanding, we’ll discuss the best MBO engagement service for your situation. To schedule a time that works best for you, use this link (or paste into your browser’s location bar): https://www.timetrade.com/book/V5F96 <https://www.timetrade.com/book/V5F96>. Complete the “MBO Partners Introductory Survey.” Before we speak, follow this link (or paste into your browser’s location bar): https://mbopartners.us2.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_9sHq2zZv0uJ0Boh <https://mbopartners.us2.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_9sHq2zZv0uJ0Boh>. This survey helps MBO understand how you operate your consulting business and enables us to focus our call the information that will be most important to you. The survey should take less than 10 minutes. Please note that if you do not complete the survey before we speak, I will complete it for you during the consultation call. However, the call will go much faster if you take the survey first. During the consultation, we’ll also go over how to enroll with MBO to be ready for any assignments. Thanks and I look forward to speaking with you! Best Regards,Nicole ___________________________________Nicole BrothertonAccount Manager, Enterprise SolutionsMBO Partners t: 703.793.6034 <tel:703.793.6034>f: 703.793.6083 <tel:703.793.6083>e: nbrotherton@mbopartners.com <mailto:nbrotherton@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. -- Meg Plummer
megplummer1@gmail.com <mailto:megplummer1@gmail.com> M: +1.919.455.8976
